author: topix.com
title: Why farming careers are cool - Heraldseries.co.uk
text:
There are 1 comment on the Heraldseries.co.uk story from Thursday, titled Why farming careers are cool . In it, Heraldseries.co.uk reports that:
Less mud and wellies and more science, technology and engineering. That's the message the farming industry is determined to hammer home in its drive to attract new talent.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Heraldseries.co.uk.
